otherNames: Pokemon Movie 15; Pokemon Best Wishes! Season 2: Kyurem vs. Seikenshi; 劇場版 ポケットモンスター ベストウイッシュ キュレムVS聖剣士; Gekijouban Pocket Monsters Best Wishes 2: Kyurem vs. Seikenshi; Pocket Monsters Best Wishes! 2 the Movie: Kyurem vs. Seikenshi; Pokemon Best Wishes!:
synopsis: The 15th Pokemon movie and the 2nd 'Best Wishes!' movie. It will feature the legendary Pokemon Kyurem (appearing also in its new Black Kyurem and White Kyurem formes.) The Legendary Musketeer Pokemon-Cobalion, Terrakion and Virizion-will appear alongside their newly revealed 4th member, Keldeo.
